rubric_dimensions.name: Git Forensic Analysis
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Run git log in reverse and inspect progression quality.

rubric_dimensions.name: State Management Rigor
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify Pydantic and TypedDict state with Annotated reducers.

rubric_dimensions.name: Graph Orchestration Architecture
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify detective fan-out and fan-in synchronization in graph wiring.

rubric_dimensions.name: Safe Tool Engineering
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Ensure sandboxed git tooling with tempfile and subprocess error handling.

rubric_dimensions.name: Structured Output Enforcement
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify judges use structured outputs bound to JudicialOpinion and retry on parse issues.

rubric_dimensions.name: Judicial Nuance and Dialectics
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify distinct Prosecutor/Defense/TechLead personas with conflicting reasoning styles.

rubric_dimensions.name: Chief Justice Synthesis Engine
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify deterministic conflict resolution rules and markdown report serialization.

rubric_dimensions.name: Theoretical Depth (Documentation)
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Check substantive explanation of Dialectical Synthesis and Fan-In/Fan-Out.

rubric_dimensions.name: Report Accuracy (Cross-Reference)
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Cross-reference claimed file paths in report against repository files.

rubric_dimensions.name: Architectural Diagram Analysis
rubric_dimensions.forensic_instruction: Confirm diagrams depict parallel detective and judge branches.

final_report_markdown:
# Audit Report

## Executive Summary

Chief Justice synthesized parallel judicial opinions using deterministic rules including security override, fact supremacy, and variance re-evaluation.

- Repo: `https://github.com/eyorata/automation_auditor.git`
- Overall Score: **1.00/5.00**

## Criterion Breakdown

## Remediation Plan

Prioritize structural reliability in graph orchestration, schema enforcement in judge outputs, and report/code cross-reference consistency.

final_report.executive_summary: Chief Justice synthesized parallel judicial opinions using deterministic rules including security override, fact supremacy, and variance re-evaluation.
final_report.remediation_plan: Prioritize structural reliability in graph orchestration, schema enforcement in judge outputs, and report/code cross-reference consistency.
